title: Honda launches new Activa with car-like smart features at Rs 74,536
description: The company said the new Honda Activa H-Smart will be available in three trims -- Standard, Deluxe and Smart -- priced at Rs 74,536, Rs 77,036 and Rs 80,537 (ex-showroom), respectively. It claims that the new Activa will get five new patented applications. The Activa 6G Smart Key variant gets four smart features -Smart Unlock, Smart Start, Smart Find & Smart Safe.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
